original_title: เซียนล่าปอบ
overview: The disciple of a Chinese master attempts to use what he learned defeat an evil Chinese master after he plots to use his girlfriend's virginal blood to resurrect a demon. With a low budget not affording much in the way of special effects or art direction (it takes place almost entirely outdoors), a cast of no-name actors and a soundtrack filled with stolen popular music from other countries, this 'B' flick is considered low grade in its country of origin.
title: Wizard Hunts Ogre
